name: Neurotoxic BATTLE DEMO 2
description:
After getting accepted into the Neurotoxic group, Rebecca Mood must do some combat training to defeat The Deviants! As nurses do of course.  This game is similar to the Shin Megami Tensei series and Deltarune!

This BATTLE DEMO 2 includes...
  • 3 Battles
  • A brand new menu
  • Awesome new music!
  • New character art!
  • And maybe a secret boss...?
  Credits: Programming: 

Aria#3086, Deadheatdoom

Visuals: 

Deadheatdoom, Byocore, Anonymous

Music:

Main Menu Theme: Anonymous

Oath Breaker (Battle Theme):  Lidkas Plus+, Anonymous

Welcome to Paradise!: R3

Reaper Roulette: Lidkas Plus+

- CONTROLS -

Z - Confirm

X - Back

C - Menu

SHIFT - Run

!USE THE ARROW KEYS!
